text.0: be with us i have chosen thee stand stedfast and immovable.
text.1: let all the people wish for thee let not thy kingship fall away.
text.2: be even here fall not away be like a mountain unremoved.
text.3: stand stedfast here like indras self and hold the kingship in the grasp.
text.4: this man hath indra stablished made secure by strong oblations power.
text.5: may soma speak a benison and brahmaṇaspati on him.
text.6: firm is the sky and firm the earth and stedfast also are these hills.
text.7: stedfast is all this living world and stedfast is this king of men.
text.8: stedfast may varuṇa the king stedfast the god bṛhaspati.
text.9: stedfast may indra stedfast too may agni keep thy stedfast reign.
text.10: on constant soma let us think with constant sacrificial gift.
text.11: and then may indra make the clans bring tribute unto thee alone.
